attributes.action: allow captured terrorists to be tortured for information on the location of other terrorists and attacks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Terrorists are killing people on our streets, on our tubes and on our airplanes. We don't know where or when these attacks will happen, but terrorists do. The only way to obtain this information quickly without having to set up a very long and costly MI5 operation is to use torture. I hope this is a step to a safer Britain.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
